mapper.insert: insert into suit_pic (id, suit_id, picture_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
